alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 7:26PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, southeastern Bay and eastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Gadsden, Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 830 PM EST/730 PM CST/... At 726 PM EST/626 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chattahoochee to near Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Quincy, Blountstown, Havana, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Chattahoochee, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Wewahitchka, Gretna, Bristol, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Juniper, Douglas City and Abe Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST/800 PM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
